ms.safi.btsync.dto

Class Hosts

  • Object
    • ms.safi.btsync.dto.Hosts

  • public class Hosts
extends Object
    JavaBean implementation of a list of Hosts. The hosts are in the format address:port.

    An example of a hosts listing: 

     {
      "hosts" : ["192.168.1.1:4567",
      "example.com:8975"]
 }
    Author:
    Omeed Safi
